text: Thank you for visiting the 1st-line Equipment, LLC website. Please carefully read the following Terms of Use before using the website (the “Site”). text: By visiting any area on the Site, by purchasing any product from this Site and/or by registering for any interactive functionality of this Site, you are deemed to have accepted these Terms of Use and the Site’s Privacy Policy. Access, distribution and/or use of this Site is subject to all applicable laws and regulations. To the extent that access, distribution and/or use of this Site would be deemed illegal by applicable law, such access, distribution and/or use is prohibited.
Privacy
Copyright Information

In the event that you register for an account on the Site, you will be asked to choose a password which you shall use to access your account. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your password. You agree not to use the account or password of any other person at any time or to disclose your password to any third party. You agree to notify 1st-line immediately: (i) of any loss of your password; and/or (ii) if you suspect any unauthorized access to or use of your account or password. You are solely responsible for any and all use of your account and password. 1st-line shall not be responsible or liable, directly or indirectly, in any way for any loss or damage of any kind incurred as a result of, or in connection with, your failure to comply with this section of the Terms of Use.

a statement that the information in the notification is accurate, and under penalty of perjury, and that the complaining party is authorized to act on behalf of the owner of the exclusive right that is allegedly being infringed.

section: Disclaimer of Use and Limitation of Liability

text: The information, services, products offered for sale and materials contained in and/or advertised on the Site, including, without limitation, text, graphics and links, are provided on an “AS IS” basis with no warranty, unless explicitly expressed by 1st-line.

Electronic Communications

When you communicate with 1st-line electronically, via email or otherwise, you consent to receive electronic communications from 1st-line. You agree that all communications (including, but not limited to all notices, agreements and disclosures) provided to you electronically by 1st-line satisfy any legal requirement that such communication be in writing. 1st-line encourages you to retain your own copies of relevant information

With respect to all communications you make to or through the Site, including but not limited to feedback, questions, comments, suggestions and the like: (i) you shall have no right to confidentiality in your communications and 1st-line shall have no obligation to protect your communications from disclosure; (ii) 1st-line shall be free to reproduce, use, publish, display, disclose and distribute your communications to others without limitation; and (iii) 1st-line shall be free to use any ideas, concepts, know-how, information, data content or techniques contained in your communications for any purpose whatsoever, including but not limited to the development, production and marketing of products and services that incorporate such information.

From time to time, the policies set forth in these Terms of Use may change. We will post changes to the Terms of Use on this Site. Please review these Terms of Use often so that you will remain abreast of our current policies.

No narrowed construction, modification or invalidation of any provision shall affect the construction, validity or enforceability of such provision in any other jurisdiction. No waiver by 1st-line of any term or condition of these Terms of Use shall be deemed a further or continuing waiver of such term or condition or of any other term or condition, and 1st-line’s failure to assert any right or demand compliance with any provision of these Terms of Use shall not be deemed to constitute a waiver of any such right or provision.

To the fullest extent permitted by law, no arbitration brought pursuant hereto shall be joined to any other action or arbitration.

Notwithstanding anything to the contrary set forth in these Terms of Use, 1st-line may at any time seek injunctive or other appropriate relief against you and/or against others, in any state or federal court in the state of New Jersey, in the event that 1st-line believes that there is a violation, or a threatened violation, of any of 1st-line’s intellectual property rights and, in such case, you hereby consent to the exclusive jurisdiction and venue of such court.
